author: Amanda Jackson, CNN
title: Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard launched a virtual camp for kids. Now they are hiring camp counselors
description: Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard's brand, Hello Bello, is looking to hire camp counselors for their newly launched virtual kids camp.
content:
(CNN)Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard's brand, Hello Bello, is looking to hire camp counselors for their newly launched virtual kids camp.
Hello Bello is the couple's family brand that sells baby products such as diapers, vitamins and lotions. At the beginning o… [+1525 chars]
